welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kamakurayama, Japan! This charming city is known for its stunning temples, beautiful beaches, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kamakurayama has to offer.

restaurants.name: 秋本
restaurants.description: 秋本 is a japanese restaurant located in 鎌倉市.
restaurants.address: 小町1-6-15 (i-ZA鎌倉 3F), 鎌倉市, 神奈川県, 248-0006

restaurants.name: Caraway (キャラウェイ)
restaurants.description: Caraway (キャラウェイ) is a japanese curry restaurant located in 鎌倉市.

restaurants.name: Iwata Coffee (イワタコーヒー店)
restaurants.description: Iwata Coffee (イワタコーヒー店) is a café located in 鎌倉市.

restaurants.name: Dankazura Kosuzu (段葛 こ寿々)
restaurants.description: Dankazura Kosuzu (段葛 こ寿々) is a soba restaurant located in 鎌倉市.

restaurants.name: 納言志るこ店
restaurants.description: 納言志るこ店 is a wagashi place located in 鎌倉市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 3 hours per day.
